description: The intent to attach or detach the specified volume to/from the specified Node. VolumeAttachment objects are non-namespaced.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object metadata. The name must be a valid DNS subdomain name.

spec.description: Specification of the desired attach/detach volume behavior. Populated by the Kubernetes system. This field cannot be updated.
